name: NPR
text:
Jon Batiste's fingers playing the piano were animated for Pixar's new film.

"I was almost in tears, because you see your essence and you think: Wow, this is the first Black Pixar lead and we're putting jazz culture out there in this massive way."
https://t.co/zIs2tIBR9G

name: NPR
text:
Pope Francis: "I ask everyone — government leaders, businesses, international organizations — to foster cooperation and not competition, and to seek a solution for everyone: vaccines for all, especially for the most vulnerable and needy."
https://t.co/SO72oDVado

name: NPR
text: Scientists say a new variant of the coronavirus sweeping through the U.K. appears more transmissible and harder to control in terms of spread. https://t.co/IQBy7uB16f

name: NPR
text:
The new, more contagious coronavirus variant that has swept through the U.K. has been confirmed in a French citizen who recently traveled to London, officials said.
https://t.co/KSBzyZx9QT

name: NPR
text:
An Australian expeditioner has been medically evacuated from Antarctica, following a multinational operation by land, air and sea that spanned thousands of miles on the remote continent.
https://t.co/TKLXYxWNyg

name: NPR
text:
For 150 years, Cizhong Church in southwest China has been home to one of the country's rare Catholic communities. Their Christmas traditions are a colorful mixture of Buddhist and Christian practices.
https://t.co/GklMPaEJ9D
